data.message: The only problem is that after you unblock them You or they should "send request" to become friends again. If possible, if  you guys should make this with out sending request.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Solomon! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Hailey

Yes, it is a good idea, since you have to send a friend reques or acept a friend request from that person you just unblock, it is a way to find out that you blocked that person, then very possible you will have to give that person explanations.
